name: palmr
description: Palmr is a self-hosted personal finance tool built on Next.js. It offers expense tracking, budget categories, and insights with a modern, customizable web UI and a responsive design.
features: Expense tracking: Log and categorize expenses with detailed metadata including date, amount, category, and notes
Budget categories: Create custom categories with spending limits to monitor and control expenses across different areas
Financial insights: Visual dashboards and charts display spending patterns, trends, and budget performance
Recurring transactions: Automate entry of regular expenses and income with templates for subscriptions and bills
Multi-currency support: Track finances in multiple currencies with automatic conversion rates for international transactions
Transaction search: Powerful filtering and search to quickly find transactions by date, category, amount, or description
Export reports: Generate financial reports in CSV or PDF format for tax preparation and record keeping
Responsive design: Mobile-optimized interface allows expense tracking on any device for logging on the go
Data privacy: Self-hosted deployment ensures complete control over sensitive financial data without third-party access
